description:
Kingdom Hearts is an action RPG following Sora on his journey 
through many worlds to find Riku and Kairi.

0.0.1.description:
### DISCLAIMER
Always check for updates in OpenKH for the AP Companion mod every time you play!  

- Click Settings > Check Mods for Updates
- If there are updates to the AP Mod, download them and rebuild your game using Mod Loader > Build and Run

The game is prone to crashing, PLEASE SAVE OFTEN

### How to play:

BEFORE MODDING, PLEASE INSTALL AND RUN KHBBS AT LEAST ONCE.

1. Install OpenKH and the Lua Backend. 
- Download the latest release of OpenKH here: https://github.com/OpenKH/OpenKh/releases/tag/latest
- Extract the files to a directory of your choosing.
- Open OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe and run first time set up.
- When prompted for game edition, choose PC, choose which platform you are playing on (Steam or EGS), navigate to your KH I.5 + II.5 installation folder in the path box, then click "Next"
- When prompted, install Panacea, then click "Next"
- When prompted, check KHBBS plus any other AP game you play (KH2) and click "Install and configure Lua backend", then click "Next".
- Extracting game data for KHBBS is unnecessary, but you may want to extract data for KH2 if you plan on playing KH2 AP.
- Click "Finish"

2. Open "OpenKh.Tools.ModsManager.exe"
3. Click the drop down menu at the top-right and choose "Birth by Sleep"
4. Click Mods>Install a New Mod
5. In "Add a new mod from GitHub" paste "gaithern/KH-BBS-AP-LUA"
6. Click Install
7. Navigate to Mod Loader and click "Build Only"
8. Place your kh1.apworld file in your worlds folder (usually /lib/worlds/)
9. Run ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
10. Click "Generate Template Settings".  This will open file explorer
11. Find "Kingdom Hearts Birth by Sleep.yaml" and copy it to /Players/ (create this folder if it does not exist)
12. Open the YAML file and change the line that says "name: Player{number}" to your desired player name.
13. Adjust the settings in the YAML to your liking
14. Run ArchipelagoGenerate.exe
15. Take the newly created AP_XXX.zip file in /output/ in upload it here: https://archipelago.gg/uploads
16. Open ArchipelagoLauncher.exe
17. Click "KHBBS Client" and connect to your server hosted on archipelago.gg
18. From the zip file mentioned above, retrieve the seed zip file (example: AP-95162914732603780136-P1-Player1_0.5.0.zip)
19. In OpenKH, click the green plus to add a mod, then click "Select and install Mod Archive or Lua Script"
20. Navigate to and select your seed zip.
21. With both the companion and the seed checked, click "Mod Loader", then "Build and Run"
22. Play!

----------

### How the randomizer works:

- All chests, stickers, bonus rewards, and pop up story rewards are randomized.
- You must collect 3 Wayfinders to open The Keyblade Graveyard and complete your seed.
0.0.1.title: KH BBS AP v.0.0.1

0.0.2.description:
- Added item pop ups for AP items to help mitigate crashes
- Changed the dummy item used in order for journal tracking to work
- Lot of small bug fixes\

0.1.2.title: KH BBS AP v.0.1.2

0.1.3.description:
- Some logic fixes by @esutley
- Seeds now say the characters name by @cloudofdarkhole6
- Add missing Chaos Snake command by @Sora3100
- Updated to work with new patch code for AP versions >= 0.6.2
0.1.3.title: KH BBS AP v.0.1.3

0.1.4.description: - Update by @esutley to make command boards progression to fix a logic bug.
0.1.4.title: KH BBS AP v0.1.4

0.1.5.description:
- Reworked logic to require movement abilities
- Added logic for having Thunder and Fire access for locations that need it
- Added Advanced Logic option for using Sliding Dash and tight jumps to reach locations
- Defensive Tools (SC, OM, LB) fight logic for final boss and other difficult locations
- Final Terra-Xehanort location only added if option is enabled
- Added Option Groups
- Added start_inventory_from_pool
- Option to remove minigame checks
- Option to remove Mirage Arena Medal checks
- Option to include Mirage Arena locations that require global unlocks
- Added Mirage Arena and Realm of Darkness as starting worlds depending on settings
- Removed Realm of Darkness Early option
- Added option to remove/enable Realm of Darkness entirely

0.1.6.description:
- Reduced has_x_worlds on superbosses to a reachable amount if only initial worlds are in the pool
- Removed "Radiant Garden Examine Pooh's Story Book Hunny Pot Board" locations as they can be potentially inaccessible
- Added slot data for options, tested and working with poptracker I'm working on

0.1.7.description:
- The range start for Max STR was 10 so it always locked the max at 10. Changed to match the start for minimum STR
- Remove guaranteed Fire from pool for Ventus since he doesn't need it
- Fix has_x_worlds logic error for Aqua's last LoD location
- Fix incorrect location name for Aqua MT sticker
- Mirage Arena world added to item pool if Command Board or Minigames enabled
- Update to 0.6.5 and future proof for 0.7.0
